mapper.select: select * from (select finfinfin.*, row_number() over(partition by aname order by aname, amountsum) rnum from ( select amountSum, nvl(star,0) restar, ri.riid, ri.riroom, ri.aid, ac.aname, ac.aaddress, ac.amainimg, ac.agrade from ( select riid, sum(amount) amountsum from ( select fin.* , case when peseason ='성수기' then ripeak when peseason ='준성수기' then risemipeak when peseason ='비수기' then rioff end as amount from (select a.*,dt.ds from (select pr.pestart, pr.peend, pr.peseason, ri.riid, ri.ripeak, ri.risemipeak, ri.rioff from room_info ri left outer join (select ri.riid from review r, reservation re, room_info ri where r.rid=re.rid and re.riid=ri.riid group by ri.riid) cnt on ri.riid=cnt.riid left outer join accommodations ac on ac.aid=ri.aid left outer join period pr on pr.aid=ac.aid) a,date_t dt where ds >= #{rcheckin} and ds <= #{rcheckout}) fin where to_date(ds,'yy/mm/dd')>=pestart and to_date(ds,'yy/mm/dd')<=peend) group by riid) finfin, room_info ri, accommodations ac, ( select riid,star from ( (select ri.riid ,cnt.star star from room_info ri left outer join (select nvl(avg(r.restar),0) star,ri.riid from review r,reservation re, room_info ri where r.rid=re.rid and re.riid=ri.riid group by ri.riid) cnt on ri.riid=cnt.riid left outer join accommodations ac on ac.aid=ri.aid left outer join period pr on pr.aid=ac.aid)) group by riid,star) star where star.riid = ri.riid and ri.riid=finfin.riid and ac.aid = ri.aid and ac.aisdel is null and ri.riroom-(select count(rcheckin) from reservation where rcheckin <= #{rcheckin} and rcheckout >= #{rcheckout} and rcancel is null)>= #{countRoom} and ri.rimaxper>= #{rimaxper} and ri.riminper<= #{riminper} and (ac.aaddress like '%'||#{aaddress}||'%' or ac.aname like '%'||#{aname}||'%') order by star asc,amountSum asc)finfinfin order by aname asc,amountsum asc) and rnum = 1
